categories: Category:Articles with an excess of redlinks
Category:Legends short stories from Star Wars Insider
Category:Star Wars: The Official Magazine articles

nodes.text: "Medstar: Intermezzo" is a short story written by Michael Reaves and Steve Perry, published in Star Wars Insider 83 and Star Wars: The Official Magazine 65. It takes place between the novels MedStar I: Battle Surgeons and MedStar II: Jedi Healer, and features characters from the two novels. In March 2008, the story was archived on Hyperspace.
